author: timbeiko
content:
Proper blog post coming out tomorrow, but in case anyone wants to get a head start on getting their nodes upgraded for London, here is the list of client versions which are compatible ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§ 

Geth: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/releases/tag/v1.10.5 
Nethermind: https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/releases/tag/1.10.77
Erigon (f.k.a. TurboGeth): https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/releases/tag/v2021.07.03
Besu: https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/releases/tag/21.7.1 
OpenEthereum (f.k.a. Parity): https://github.com/openethereum/openethereum/releases/tag/v3.3.0-rc.4 
EthereumJS VM: https://github.com/ethereumjs/ethereumjs-monorepo/releases/tag/%40ethereumjs%2Fvm%405.5.0
